headline: Aston Villa Women appoint former Leverkusen and Twente boss

headline: Mary Earps to leave Manchester United Women
summary: Manchester United have today confirmed that goalkeeper Mary Earps will depart the club, following the conclusion of her contract. Earps made 125 appearances during her five-year spell with United, featuring last season’s FA Cup Final […]

headline: Glentoran go three points clear in the Sports Direct Women’s Premiership

headline: Goalkeeper Courtney Brosnan extends her stay at Everton Women

headline: Nikola Karczewska to join AC Milan after departure from Spurs Women
summary: Poland international forward Nikola Karczewska is leaving Tottenham Hotspur at the end of the month and signing for AC Milan. The 24-year-old joined Spurs in the summer of 2022 from French side Fleury, making 19 […]

headline: Five uncapped players selected in Wales Women’s squad
summary: Rhian Wilkinson has announced her 26-player squad as Wales finish their EURO 2025 qualifying group with games against Croatia and Kosovo. Josie Green again misses out through injury, while five uncapped players have been named […]
